title: Roasted vegetable and goats' cheese tart
description: This easy puff-pastry tart can take any seasonal vegetables you throw at it and works perfectly as a quick supper.
ingredients: 4 small fresh beetroot, trimmed but not peeled
1 courgette, trimmed, chopped into medium-sized pieces
1 head fennel, fronds trimmed, chopped into medium-sized pieces
2 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for drizzling
salt and freshly ground black pepper
